about_the_game:
Add to your wishlist to receive notifications when the game is released.

Become the ultimate shopping mall tycoon! Mall Manager Simulator is a deep management game where you build and develop your very own shopping center. Every decision you make impacts your revenue, visitor numbers, and customer satisfaction. Manage stores, handle advertising, upgrade the quality index, and keep the mall spotless to rise above the competition!

Key Features:

  • Full control at your fingertips: Manage your entire mall through a modern tablet interface! Use various apps to track your revenue, expenses, and handle essential management tasks with ease.

  • Expanding store network: Start with a simple store and grow your mall by unlocking and opening more stores! Each store has its own development levels, unlocking new products and furnishings as you progress.

  • Strategic pricing and customer reactions: Set the right price for your products and watch how your customers react. If your prices are too high, they'll walk away, but if you find the right balance, your profits will soar!

  • Advertising revenue and vending machines: Set up billboards and place various vending machines throughout the mall. The more visitors you attract, the higher your advertising revenue and sales will be!

  • Dynamic quality index: Boost your mall's appeal with decorative elements like plants and benches to increase foot traffic and customer satisfaction. Every detail contributes to the success of your shopping center!

  • Staff management: Hire sales assistants, cleaners, and vending machine refillers! Upgrade your staff's abilities to make them more efficient and faster in handling their tasks.

  • Comprehensive financial analysis: Monitor your mall’s financial status with the central diagram. Review daily income and expenses to ensure you’re making the best strategic decisions for growth.

  • Challenging levels and activities: Complete a variety of tasks and reach new levels to unlock exciting new features. Open new stores, install more billboards, and upgrade the mall’s infrastructure to keep your visitors coming back for more!

Why should you play Mall Manager Simulator?

Mall Manager Simulator is a rich and engaging management game that challenges your strategic thinking. Step by step, you’ll develop your mall, with every decision you make shaping the future of your shopping empire. Can you become the most successful mall manager and build the city's greatest shopping destination?

Dive into the challenge and transform your mall into a shopping paradise! Download Mall Manager Simulator now and start your journey toward becoming the best mall manager in town!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / RYZEN 5 2600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
